column1: Question
How much do you enjoy subjects like Math and Science? (0 = Not at all, 5 = Very much)

Do you prefer hands-on practical work over theoretical study? (0 = Strongly disagree, 5 = Strongly agree)
How much do you enjoy working with numbers and solving mathematical problems? (0 = Not at all, 5 = Very much)

How much do you enjoy designing and creating things? (0 = Not at all, 5 = Very much)

Do you enjoy working with machines and understanding how they function? (0 = Not at all, 5 = Very much)

Do you enjoy analyzing data and making sense of information? (0 = Not at all, 5 = Very much)
How important is job stability when considering your future career? (0 = Not important, 5 = Very important)
